_template_info.name: Cover Design Tournament
_template_info.description: Tournament template for selecting winning cover designs through competitive evaluation
_template_info.use_case: Choose best cover design from multiple concepts

cover_analysis.system_prompt: You are an expert book cover designer and marketing analyst. Evaluate covers for genre appropriateness, visual impact, and market appeal.
cover_analysis.user_prompt_template:
Analyze this book cover design:

Book Title: {title}
Author: {author}
Genre: {genre}
Target Audience: {target_audience}
Book Summary: {summary}

[Cover Image Description: {cover_description}]

Competitive Titles:
{comp_titles}

Evaluate on:

1. **Genre Appropriateness** (0-10)
   - Visual conventions of {genre}
   - Reader expectations
   - Signaling accuracy

2. **Visual Impact** (0-10)
   - Eye-catching quality
   - Emotional resonance
   - Memorable elements

3. **Marketability** (0-10)
   - Shelf appeal
   - Online thumbnail readability
   - Differentiation from competition

4. **Technical Quality** (0-10)
   - Typography choices
   - Color palette
   - Composition and balance
   - Production readiness

5. **Brand Consistency** (0-10)
   - Fits imprint identity
   - Series potential
   - Publisher brand alignment

Return as JSON:
{{
  "evaluation": {{
    "overall_score": 0-100,
    "recommendation": "select"|"revise"|"reject",
    "scores": {{
      "genre_appropriateness": 0-10,
      "visual_impact": 0-10,
      "marketability": 0-10,
      "technical_quality": 0-10,
      "brand_consistency": 0-10
    }},
    "strengths": ["Strength 1", "Strength 2", "Strength 3"],
    "weaknesses": ["Weakness 1", "Weakness 2"],
    "thumbnail_readability": {{"score": 0-10, "notes": "Details"}},
    "genre_comparison": "How it compares to {genre} standards",
    "revision_suggestions": "If not perfect, what to improve",
    "market_positioning": "How this cover positions the book"
  }}
}}
